subject: Soccer
War and Revolution
lead_paragraph: Israel was barred from playing host to international matches until further notice because of the violence that has affected the region. In a letter sent to the Israel Football Association yesterday, UEFA, the European soccer governing body, said all games scheduled for Israel “shall be played outside of Israeli territory.”.
